  Game information:
  =================

  From time immemorial there has existed a guardian who maintained the
  equilibrium between the different elements.

  Centuries ago, when attempts were made to steal his power from him, the
  elemental sorcerers unleashed his anger, which resulted in a catastrophic
  imbalance between the elements, turning everything into rock and the earth
  became predominant. However, by turning his own spells against him, they
  managed to confine him in a block of stone, thus preventing the elemental
  imbalance from rendering NelwÃƒÂ« uninhabitable. None of the sorcerers dabbled
  in the earth element thereafter, for fear of waking the guardian. Centuries
  have now passed, and the rock has gradually eroded and changed back into the
  water it was originally, long ago. The guardianÃ‚â€™s magic is making its presence
  felt again; rocks rain down on the cities; the water is becoming full of mud.
  The earth, the element forbidden to the elemental sorcerers, is awakening.

  Features:

  Ã‚â€¢ Create your own character from 4 races. Choose your face, and custom your
    hair and skin colour, it will give you special skills and abilities.

  Ã‚â€¢ Manage your evolution by choosing among 150 skills and spells.

  Ã‚â€¢ As you are not stuck in a class, it gives you a real freedom to create
    exactly the character you want to play and to adapt it to your gameplay
    style.

  Ã‚â€¢ Face over 100 magical creatures and boss.

  Ã‚â€¢ Build your team out of 2 from 8 possible companions. Each of them has
    his own story, background, abilities and can give you quests. Your way
    to treat them will change their devotion, and they can become your friend
    to the death or lover.

  Ã‚â€¢ A vast, open fantasy universe offering complete freedom, from the flying
    zeppelin city of Cloudworks to the mage volcano city of Brazer.

  Ã‚â€¢ Multiplayer mode in cooperative or PVP up to 8 players.

  Installation Information:
  =========================

  Just extract the archives and burn/mount with your favorite software.
  Install and copy cracked content from Fairlight dir then play, enjoy.

                                                           /Team FairLight
